description: This template deploys SEMOSS on a Windows server. It creates a single Windows VM, installs SEMOSS< Google Chrome, confugres ports on Azure NSG and Windows Firewall. It will take 15-20 minutes to install and once it is successful, SEMOSS can be reach through your local comupeter at http://<IP/DNS>:5355/SemossWeb/#!/playbook
summary: Deploy SMEOSS on Windows on a single VM.
